import axios from "axios"; import React, { useState } from "react"; const EpmloyerSignup = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", companyName: "", companyLocation: "", phoneNumber: "", email: "", password: "", }); const [selectedSector, setSelectedSector] = useState(""); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prevFormData) => ({ ...prevFormData, [name]: value, })); }; const handleSectorChange = (e) => { setSelectedSector(e.target.value); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const completeFormData = { ...formData, sector: selectedSector }; const response = await axios.post( "http://localhost:5000/api/employer/signup", completeFormData ); console.log(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error("Error signing up employer:", error); } }; return (

); }; export default EpmloyerSignup;
